attributes.action: To get our local council to collect our Bins once a week in the summer months
attributes.background:
The majority of residents & community with in the Borough of Broxbourne have a infestation of maggots with in there refuse.

We need the Borough of Broxbourne to act on this with in the summer months to empty all bins once a week rather then once every two weeks it's in hygienic

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
